method.name: float
method.digest: Set the normalized position in the function
method.description: Set the normalized position in the function.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: Normalized position. This is the position within the function defined by the 'shape' attribute.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Calculation Modality. Choose whether to perform calculations on-the-fly for greater accuracy or use a lookup table for greater speed.

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: Shape of function. Transition across the position using one of several shapes: 'linear', 'equal_power', or 'square_root'.
